subject: Football
lead_paragraph: BOSTON, Dec. 25 (AP) — With a fourth consecutive division crown secured after their 24-21 win against the Jacksonville Jaguars, Patriots Coach Bill Belichick must now decide how to approach his team’s final regular-season game against the surging Tennessee Titans.
